channel.title: Blog of a nobody
channel.description: Why should I not have a blog?

item.title: Why should I not have a blog?
item.description: Why should I not have a blog? I have often seen blogs of people I have never even heard of and I fail to see - because I do not happen to be "somebody" - why my blog should not be interesting. My only regret is that I did not commence it when I was a youth. [Edit - The paragraph above is coined ...

media:content.media:title: Why should I not have a blog?

item.title: New beginnings
item.description: My partner Carr13 and I have just moved into our new home in Surbiton. I have also started working at my new job at the Generous and Advantageous Insurance (which I will henceforth call G&A) in London - all in the space of a week. Phew! The people at Gen&Ad seem nice enough if a little quiet. I wore ...

item.title: Gathering the news
item.description: I have been a bit rushed today and am suffering from a lack of newspapers. I tried to watch the news on television last night but found that our aerial is quite inadequate, and whilst I could see what was happening, we had no sound. In the case of political debate that is a severe limitation. So I ...

item.title: Read all about it!
item.description: Since I intend to be first to comment on breaking news, I visited our local corner shop to buy the Saturday papers. I plan to buy at least 3 papers a day to get a good balanced coverage of the news. I introduced myself to the lady behind the counter but I couldn't understand her name. I will refer ...

item.title: Sunday morning
item.description: Carr13 and I attended the Church of Jesus Christ of Surbiton this morning. We intend to attend regularly so as to become part of the community and perhaps gain some points with the big man upstairs. The vicar is a nice enough man though a little quietly spoken and a bit of a stutter. His curate is a ...
